column1: Little Goat Diner////Never had Goat Chili before and this is the best chili we ever had!!  Trust me
column2: I've had my share of chili. Had the braised beef sandwich
column3: can't remember the name of it but it was spectacular!   If you go to the bakery area
column4: there's a bar we sat at. Had the Summer Crush cocktail- Delicious!  Definitely coming back!
